price: 164. (Y dicen los ángeles:) “Todos nosotros tenemos un rango asignado (en el cielo).
arabic: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wamā minnā illā lahu maqāmun maʿlūmun
